## Material/Surface information file "mat_scene08"

Author: 					Lukas Asp√∂ck / las@akustik.rwth-aachen.de
Date:						2016/07/11	

Notes:						This file contains information about the boundary conditions of the materials (4):
							"mat_scene08_absorber", "mat_scene08_concrete", "mat_scene08_paintedConcrete", "mat_scene08_tablesEquipment"
														
							All relevant values are given in separate files in the csv-format							


## Material information:

Scenes:						08
Origin of data: 			Estimated data for absorption and scattering coefficients (based on database values and in situ measurements)
Angle of incidence:			random incidence
Frequency Range:			20 Hz - 20 kHz (31 third octave values, see line 1 in csv file)	

Absorption coefficients:	[x] (see line 2 in csv file)
Scattering coefficients: 	[x] (see line 3 in csv file) 
Impedance values:			[ ]

Data files:					/_csv/mat_scene08_absorber.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene08_concrete.csv
							/_csv/mat_scene08_paintedConcrete.csv		(Note: in Phase1, this material was accidently called mat_scene08_plaster)
							/_csv/mat_scene08_tablesEquipment.csv
							
Image files:
							/_img/mat_scene08_absorber_1.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene08_concrete_1.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene08_concrete_2.JPG
							/_img/mat_scene08_paintedConcrete.JPG														
							/_img/mat_scene08_tablesEquipment_1.JPG														
							/_img/mat_scene08_tablesEquipment_2.JPG														
							/_img/mat_scene08_tablesEquipment_3.JPG														
							/_img/mat_scene08_tablesEquipment_4.JPG
